sec.title: Parking braking system for wheel-mounted rigs

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: A purely mechanical parking braking system for holding machines in a stationary position shall be provided. The parking braking system shall be latching.

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: The parking braking system shall be able to hold the rig on the steepest slope it is allowed to operate on, up to a maximum of 20°, according to the manufacturer's specification with a safety factor of 1,2. For operating on slopes steeper than 20°, see 4.19.2.
